```{r}
height <- c(73,50,68,72,63,64,70.5,60,68,72)
mean(height)
```

The mean of the height values is: `r mean(height)`.

The mean is written as $\bar{x}=\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{x_i}{n}$.
